solution_line_template: Lena has {clippings_per_friend} clippings per friend, so she has {clippings_per_friend} * {num_friends} = <<{clippings_per_friend}*{num_friends}={total_clippings}>>{total_clippings} clippings to glue.

She needs {drops_per_clipping} drops of glue per clipping, so she will need {drops_per_clipping} * {total_clippings} = <<{drops_per_clipping}*{total_clippings}={total_glue_drops}>>{total_glue_drops} drops of glue.
